examples.translation: 彼が来るかどうか疑わしい。
examples.english_translation: I doubt whether he will come.

etymology.value: ラテン語の 'dubius' (疑わしい)から派生。'duo' (二つ) に関連し、二つの選択肢の間で揺れ動く状態を示す。

verb_forms.present_active_indicative: dubito, dubitas, dubitat, dubitamus, dubitatis, dubitant
verb_forms.imperfect_active_indicative: dubitabam, dubitabas, dubitabat, dubitabamus, dubitabatis, dubitabant
verb_forms.future_active_indicative: dubitabo, dubitabis, dubitabit, dubitabimus, dubitabitis, dubitabunt
verb_forms.perfect_active_indicative: dubitavi, dubitavisti, dubitavit, dubitavimus, dubitavistis, dubitaverunt
verb_forms.pluperfect_active_indicative: dubitaveram, dubitaveras, dubitaverat, dubitaveramus, dubitaveratis, dubitaverant
verb_forms.future_perfect_active_indicative: dubitavero, dubitaveris, dubitaverit, dubitaverimus, dubitaveritis, dubitaverint

usage_notes.explanation: 'Dubito' はラテン語の動詞で、「疑う」「ためらう」という意味を持ちます。英語の 'doubt' の語源です。

derivatives: indubitable (形容詞: 疑いのない - 英語)
doubt (名詞/動詞: 疑い - 英語)

readability_explanation.text: This is a Latin word, so its readability depends on the reader's familiarity with Latin.
